activities: Personal data received from the EU and / or Switzerland is used to support disaster recovery capabilities in the event that our European data center is ever rendered inoperable.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: CIBT has established internal mechanisms to verify its ongoing adherence to this Statement.  CIBT also encourages individuals covered by this Statement to raise any concerns about our processing of their personal information by contacting us through the Customer Service phone numbers listed on our website or via e-mail.  Contact information can be accessed at CIBT.COM.  CIBT will seek to resolve any concerns and do so timely manner.   CIBT has also agreed to participate in the dispute resolution program provided by the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  CIBT is firmly committed to ensuring that appropriate actions are taken to comply with Safe Harbor Principles.
